item.title: Impact investors FMO and BlueOrchard back Ghana’s digital lender Fido in $30M Series B round
item.dc:creator: Annie Njanja
item.description:
Digital lending platforms have become an easy and swift alternative source of credit for microenterprises and individuals overlooked by traditional banking institutions. These platforms have turned into a lifeline for millions of underbanked and demand will keep growing, pushing the value of the digital lending platform market in the Middle East and Africa to reach […]

item.title: PharmEasy still 92% below its peak $5.6 billion valuation, investor estimates
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
Indian online pharmacy startup PharmEasy, once valued at $5.6 billion, is still about 92% below its peak valuation, according to new estimates by its investor Janus Henderson. According to the British-American global asset firm, which disclosed how it values its shares in the Indian startup in a securities filing, PharmEasy’s implied valuation at the end […]

item.title: Canva has increased prices for its Teams product
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
Canva, the design platform, is increasing prices steeply for some customers. And it’s blaming the move in part on generative AI. In the U.S., some Canva Teams subscribers on older pricing plans are seeing the sticker price for a five-person plan jump from $119.99 per year to $500 per year (with a 40% discount for […]

item.title: Snap CEO says the company is testing a ‘simplified’ Snapchat
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Zeff
item.description:
Snap is testing a “simplified version of Snapchat,” CEO Evan Spiegel wrote in a letter to employees published on Snap’s website Tuesday. The CEO says the simplified version aims to improve the platform’s accessibility and usability. For those that remember Snapchat’s 2018 redesign, this news may do little to stoke confidence. item.title: Bitcoin ATMs are a hotbed for scams, FTC says
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description:
The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) published a report about increasing fraud at Bitcoin ATMs. These ATMs allow people to turn their cash into crypto, but they’ve become a tool for scammers to perpetrate fraud. Since 2020, the FTC says, fraud at Bitcoin ATMs has ballooned nearly tenfold, and just in the first half of 2024, […]

item.title: Volkswagen is rolling out its ChatGPT assistant to the US

item.description:
Volkswagen is taking its ChatGPT voice assistant experiment on the road. Or more specifically, to vehicles it sells in the United States.  The German automaker announced in January at CES 2024 plans to add an AI-powered chatbot into all Volkswagen models equipped with its IDA voice assistant. item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description:

The social media platform now allows followers to comment on each other’s Stories, making the experience more community-focused, akin to livestreaming where users can engage in larger discussions.
